name: Sciamano240 Style
description:
This LoRA is trained to imitate the style of Mirco Cabbia, aka Sciamano240.

For the best results, use the model "Realistic Vision V1.3", check Hires-fix and set 0.2 for denoising strength, and choose SwinIR_4X as upscaler.

meta.prompt: portrait of a woman in the style of <lora:Sciamano240-000008:0.7>, pink hair, red eyes, in a futuristic leather black suit, with a red background
meta.negativePrompt: (multiple people:1.2), (extra head:1.2), grainy, watermark, text, error, blurry, jpeg artifacts, cropped, worst quality, low quality, bad anatomy, ugly, deformed, (extra arms:1.2), extra limbs, (extra fingers:1.3), b&w, (deformed hands:1.2)
